content: waffle hat by gail bable copyright august 2002 forces you can find out more about this charity and ship on the link below m aterials needed skein of worsted weight yarn 200 yards size 8 16 circular needle and set of double points or whatever size you need to get the gauge below needle for sewing up the top scissors gauge 4 stitches to 1 6 row to 1 cast on 76 stitches join being careful not to twist your stitches knit 2 purl 2 around placing marker at the end of the row repeat this row for 12 row pattern row row 1 and 2 knit row 3 and 4 k2 p2 repeat the pattern row until the hat measures 7 ending with the two knit row decrease row row1 k2 p2 decrease repeat around row 2 k2 p1 row 3 and 4 knit row 5 k2 decrease p1 repeat row 6 k1 p1 row 7 and 8 knit row 9 k1 k2tog around k last 2 stitches row 10 knit row 11 k 2 decrease row 12 knit repeat row 11 and 12 until only 8 stitches remain and cut yarn leaving a 10 tail using large eyed sewing needle run thread through remaining stitches and fasten_off weave in ends and finish off to make a child s size hat cast on 64 stitches and follow above knitting instructions until piece measures 6 follow instructions then to decrease and complete hat for a new born cast on 48 or 52 stitches and follow instructions until piece measures 5 then follow decrease instructions and finish
